channel.title: Allstar Reborn - 24/7 -
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/skzzfb.png[/img] To visit the forums, click [url=http://allstarreborn.createaforum.com]here[/url] To play on the webclient, click [url=http://allstarreborn.createaforum.com/index.php?action=ezportal;sa=page;p=3]here[/url] To download the desktop client, click [url=http://up.ht/19Xa3qR]here[/url] [hr] Note: I decided to host this since allstars are dead.
Allstar Reborn is a highly edited Allstar that is nearly unrecognizable as the project originally started in 2011 as my very first time using Java as a developer. Since then I've learned a lot and have modified the source to be 10x as stable. The server is an economy based server with a much more difficult economy than any other Allstar. Infact, even Dragon Armor has to be worked for! The skills have ALL been improved by quite a lot.
Server features: Awesome eco for an allstar Flawless bank pin system All skills improved upon Abyss runecrafting 6 Fun bosses! Double XP Weekends on select weekends! Simple quickchat to show off your levels! Click a skill in the skill tab to chat your level in the skill! And many more! Try out Allstar Reborn!
If you're not already tempted to try it out, check out the media below! Bank pins: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_2WAhnlWP2Q&feature=youtu.be
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2rz3v9c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2vw69vb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2h34yzp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/jk7iab.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/flk9xi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/fu13iq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2816bz9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zi1vds.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/o045dv.jpg[/img] [/center]

item.title: Allstar Reborn - 24/7 -
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“Revamp dis Shit, post:5, topic:534445”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=653246.msg4377491#msg4377491 date=1382477544]
I can assure you all that this is a good, quality server with a source-code that is barely recognizable to be Allstar’s.
[/quote]
That makes 2 allstars then

OT: Alex… all the allstars are dead because only noobs straight from RS who have no programming experience whatsoever decide to make them…You and I may be the only worthwhile developers still interested in Allstars…

Also, I have a question for you Alex…why would you put this online and all that shit if you’re only gonna take it down again? I’m not too keen on why someone would just play a server to have all of their stats/etc deleted after only a few weeks/months.[/quote]
Nobody dedicates much time to allstars. I’m not sure how long this’ll go on but I want it to for a while.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar Reborn - 24/7 -
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

arham 4:

I can assure you all that this is a good, quality server with a source-code that is barely recognizable to be Allstar’s.

That makes 2 allstars then

OT: Alex… all the allstars are dead because only noobs straight from RS who have no programming experience whatsoever decide to make them…You and I may be the only worthwhile developers still interested in Allstars…

Also, I have a question for you Alex…why would you put this online and all that shit if you’re only gonna take it down again? I’m not too keen on why someone would just play a server to have all of their stats/etc deleted after only a few weeks/months.

Read full topic

Note: I decided to host this since allstars are dead.

Allstar Reborn is a highly edited Allstar that is nearly unrecognizable as the project originally started in 2011 as my very first time using Java as a developer.
Since then I’ve learned a lot and have modified the source to be 10x as stable.
The server is an economy based server with a much more difficult economy than any other Allstar. Infact, even Dragon Armor has to be worked for!
The skills have ALL been improved by quite a lot.
